title.narrative: 3.1. MOE MGT CAPACITY DEVELOPMENT

description.narrative: Increased capacity of the Ministry of Education to adopt and apply standards and regulations to implement management mechanisms and to adjust budget to meet the need toward the universalization of preschool, primary and secondary education at the right age, which contributes to Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equitable Access To Quality Education (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By the end of 2019, boys and girls, especially from rural indigenous communities, will access and complete preschool and primary and will have more opportunities to complete secondary education.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Increased capacity of the Ministry of Education to adopt and apply standards and regulations to implement management mechanisms and to adjust budget to meet the need toward the universalization of preschool, primary and secondary education at the right age

description.narrative: Guatemala enfrenta desafíos históricos para superar la brecha educativa, en acceso y calidad. Gran parte de la población tiene acceso limitado a educación; el ODS 4 está lejos de alcanzarse. El país ha hecho esfuerzos para aumentar la cobertura educativa, pero los resultados son poco halagadores. Datos preliminares del Ministerio de Educación evidencian que sólo la mitad de los niños de 5 y 6 años acuden a preprimaria, que más niños entre 7 y 12 años abandonaron la primaria; sólo cuatro de cada diez transitan hacia secundaria y sólo 2 de ellos, continúan hasta terminar la secundaria. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:31/01/2020
